summary: Forward metrics from Core SDK to TypeScript SDK to enable custom metrics handling, filtering, and export to external collectors. This requires implementing support for accepting and handling metrics from Core.
userImpact: Enables users to customize metrics handling, filter metrics for cost reduction, and export to unsupported external collectors.
proposedFix: Implement TypeScript SDK support for Core's metrics export API, with separate interfaces for custom collector implementation and metric emission on existing collectors.
keyQuote: expose both the ability to impl a custom collector _and_ to emit metrics on the existing one as separate unrelated things
